note.p: Cook. Born in Marylebone, London. Kitchen-maid to the rector of Hanwell, Middlesex, 1861. Employed as a cook by Erasmus Alvey Darwin, 1871, 1881. Employed by Elinor Dicey, 1886.
Census returns of England and Wales 1861 (The National Archives: Public Record Office (RG9/781/112/23), 1871 (RG10/157/81/16), 1881 (RG11/140/47/1)
letter from Emma Darwin to G. H. Darwin, 14 August [1887] (DAR 210.3: 140)
